text:
Hey Everyone - Not sure if this is the best channel or not for this (please feel free to point me in the right direction) but..

Has anyone successfully connected web activity tracked via HubSpot tracking code to a submission made within an iframe? 

If so, how did you do this?

Hi all - does anyone know where to post questions relating to forms? I am having an issue where the Popup form is being rendered under an iframe - but from `hs-sites` which means I cannot communicate with iframe. Any Ideas on how to solve this?

Hey everyone, was referred to this Slack group for some help...

One of our clients has integrated Logik CPQ into their HubSpot portal, for custom configuration on certain complex line items.

We're looking for a way to force refresh the HubSpot page, when changes are made within the Logik iframe. Once changes are made in Logik, HubSpot should ideally refresh, and have those changes reflected on the HubSpot Line Items panel.

Does anyone know if this is possible? Cheers
<@U02F95VGFNU> Did you try Before submit event?\
In form Settings, You can enable "Raw HTML' option to use form without an iframe
